duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer an average of 45-55 inbound calls per day, ranging from simple requests to market-sensitive complex inquiries from Clients and Financial Professionals.
Deliver exceptional customer service while adhering to Attendance guidelines, Quality, Productivity, Availability, ACW, and Adherence goals established by the department.
Active participation and successful completion of customer service training and other training to remain current with operational policies, new products and procedures.
